Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~subbu165 - I assume you mean you are using the peer CLI? You should be aware that the peer CLI actually does use credentials exactly the same way as the peer. I'd like to gather some more details before closing, but I think this is a simple misunderstanding.

Action.author: jeffgarratt
Action.body: I concur with ~mastersingh24 , do you have any more comments ~subbu165 ? If not will plan to close this early next week.

Action.author: jeffgarratt
Action.body: Going to go ahead and close.. Reopen if you feel necessary.
